node.statement: PART 1 - INVERSE VERIFICATION (citing Cycle_Inverse): By Cycle_Inverse, reversing (1 6 4 3 7) gives (7 3 4 6 1), standard form g_1^{-1} = (1 7 3 4 6). By Cycle_Inverse, reversing (5 6 2 3) gives (3 2 6 5), standard form g_3^{-1} = (5 3 2 6). Verification: g_1 maps 1→6, g_1^{-1} maps 6→1. g_3 maps 5→6, g_3^{-1} maps 6→5. Correct.
